## numberGetHexString() function

Returns the hex representation of the number. If it's not a number it returns "NaN".

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function numberGetHexString(value: number): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | number |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
